variants.Description in input context: E46K mutation increases the propensity of -synuclein to fibrillize.

Experiment Method.Assay Method: Western Blot, SDS-PAGE, and electron microscopy

Material used.Description: Protein was expressed in E. coli or SH-SY5Y cells and purified using standard protocols.

Readout description.Result Description: Electron microscopy revealed the presence of amyloid fibrils, and Western Blot showed increased protein levels.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed using SH-SY5Y cells.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate using SDS-PAGE and Western Blot.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type -synuclein protein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector or water was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% on day 7.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% on day 7.
